verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> that came <S%H1961><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> speaks <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Write <S%H3789><s%> you all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> to you in a book. <S%H5612><s%>

For, see, <S%H2009><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> come, <S%H935><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that I will bring <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> and Judah, <S%H3063><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and I will cause them to return <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> that I gave <S%H5414><s%> to their fathers, <S%H1><s%> and they shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it.
And these <S%H428><s%> are the words <S%H1697><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> concerning <S%H413><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> and concerning <S%H413><s%> Judah. <S%H3063><s%>
For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> We have heard <S%H8085><s%> a voice <S%H6963><s%> of trembling, <S%H2731><s%> of fear, <S%H6343><s%> and not of peace. <S%H7965><s%>

Ask <S%H7592><s%> you now, <S%H4994><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> whether <S%H518><s%> a man <S%H2145><s%> does travail <S%H3205><s%> with child? <S%H3205><s%> why <S%H4069><s%> do I see <S%H7200><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H1397><s%> with his hands <S%H3027><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> his loins, <S%H2504><s%> as a woman in travail, <S%H3205><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> faces <S%H6440><s%> are turned <S%H2015><s%> into paleness? <S%H3420><s%>

Alas! <S%H1945><s%> for that day <S%H3117><s%> is great, <S%H1419><s%> so that none <S%H369><s%> is like <S%H3644><s%> it: it is even the time <S%H6256><s%> of Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> trouble, <S%H6869><s%> but he shall be saved <S%H3467><s%> out of it.

For it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass in that day, <S%H3117><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> that I will break <S%H7665><s%> his yoke <S%H5923><s%> from off <S%H5921><s%> your neck, <S%H6677><s%> and will burst <S%H5423><s%> your bonds, <S%H4147><s%> and strangers <S%H2114><s%> shall no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> themselves of him:
But they shall serve <S%H5647><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> their king, <S%H4428><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I will raise <S%H6965><s%> up to them.

Therefore fear <S%H3372><s%> you not, O my servant <S%H5650><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> be dismayed, <S%H2865><s%> O Israel: <S%H3478><s%> for, see, <S%H2009><s%> I will save <S%H3467><s%> you from afar, <S%H7350><s%> and your seed <S%H2233><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of their captivity; <S%H7628><s%> and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> shall return, <S%H7725><s%> and shall be in rest, <S%H8252><s%> and be quiet, <S%H7599><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> shall make him afraid. <S%H2729><s%>

For I am with you, said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> you: though <S%H3588><s%> I make <S%H6213><s%> a full end <S%H3615><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I have scattered <S%H6327><s%> you, yet <S%H389><s%> I will not make <S%H6213><s%> a full end <S%H3615><s%> of you: but I will correct <S%H3256><s%> you in measure, <S%H4941><s%> and will not leave you altogether unpunished. <S%H5352><s%>
For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Your bruise <S%H7667><s%> is incurable, <S%H605><s%> and your wound <S%H4347><s%> is grievous. <S%H2470><s%>
There is none <S%H369><s%> to plead <S%H1777><s%> your cause, <S%H1779><s%> that you may be bound <S%H4205><s%> up: you have no <S%H369><s%> healing <S%H8585><s%> medicines. <S%H7499><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> your lovers <S%H157><s%> have forgotten <S%H7911><s%> you; they seek <S%H1875><s%> you not; for I have wounded <S%H5221><s%> you with the wound <S%H4347><s%> of an enemy, <S%H341><s%> with the chastisement <S%H4148><s%> of a cruel <S%H394><s%> one, for the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your iniquity; <S%H5771><s%> because your sins <S%H2403><s%> were increased. <S%H6105><s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> cry <S%H2199><s%> you for your affliction? <S%H7667><s%> your sorrow <S%H4341><s%> is incurable <S%H605><s%> for the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your iniquity: <S%H5771><s%> because your sins <S%H2403><s%> were increased, <S%H6105><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things to you.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> they that devour <S%H398><s%> you shall be devoured; <S%H398><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> your adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one of them, shall go <S%H3212><s%> into captivity; <S%H7633><s%> and they that spoil <S%H7701><s%> you shall be a spoil, <S%H4933><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that prey <S%H962><s%> on you will I give <S%H5414><s%> for a prey. <S%H962><s%>

For I will restore <S%H5927><s%> health <S%H724><s%> to you, and I will heal <S%H7495><s%> you of your wounds, <S%H4347><s%> said the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they called <S%H7121><s%> you an Outcast, <S%H5080><s%> saying, This <S%H1931><s%> is Zion, <S%H6726><s%> whom no <S%H369><s%> man seeks <S%H1875><s%> after.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will bring <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Jacob's <S%H3290><s%> tents, <S%H168><s%> and have mercy <S%H7355><s%> on his dwelling places; <S%H4908><s%> and the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be built <S%H1129><s%> on her own heap, <S%H8510><s%> and the palace <S%H759><s%> shall remain <S%H3427><s%> after <S%H5921><s%> the manner <S%H4941><s%> thereof.

And out of them shall proceed <S%H3318><s%> thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of them that make merry: <S%H7832><s%> and I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> them, and they shall not be few; <S%H4591><s%> I will also glorify <S%H3513><s%> them, and they shall not be small. <S%H6819><s%>

Their children <S%H1121><s%> also shall be as aforetime, <S%H6924><s%> and their congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, and I will punish <S%H6485><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that oppress <S%H3905><s%> them.

And their nobles <S%H117><s%> shall be of themselves, and their governor <S%H4910><s%> shall proceed <S%H3318><s%> from the middle <S%H7130><s%> of them; and I will cause him to draw near, <S%H7126><s%> and he shall approach <S%H5066><s%> to me: for who <S%H4310><s%> is this <S%H1931><s%> <S%H2088><s%> that engaged <S%H6148><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%> to approach <S%H5066><s%> to me? said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And you shall be my people, <S%H5971><s%> and I will be your God. <S%H430><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the whirlwind <S%H5591><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> goes <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> with fury, <S%H2534><s%> a continuing <S%H1641><s%> whirlwind: <S%H5591><s%> it shall fall <S%H2342><s%> with pain <S%H2342><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>

The fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall not return, <S%H7725><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he has done <S%H6213><s%> it, and until <S%H5704><s%> he have performed <S%H6965><s%> the intents <S%H4209><s%> of his heart: <S%H3820><s%> in the latter <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall consider <S%H995><s%> it.
